Kim Yong Nam Meets Foreigners
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Foreigners
   Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a friendly conversation with Vishwanath, secretary general of the "International Kim Il Sung Prize" Council, Alva Chavez, member of the council, Kenichi Ogami, director-general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, Takao Kamakura, adviser of the National Liaison Council of the Japan Society for Study of Kim Jong Il's Works, and E. Maksim, executive chairman of the Mongolian Mt. Paektu Association for Independent Development, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Thursday.

Foreign Figure Skaters Here
articles.content:
Foreign Figure Skaters Here
   Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- Figure skaters of China, Russia, Ukraine, Hungary, Spain, France and the U.S. arrived here Thursday to participate in the 16th International Figure-Skating Festival for Paektusan Cup to be held on the occasion of the February holiday.
